text: history is made as Kim jong-un crosses
the border it's the first time a North
Korean leader has set foot in the South
the step is the latest chapter in Kim's
head-spinning makeover from a stern face
desperate into a smiling diplomat
somebody president Trump ridiculed as
little rocket rocket man is on a suicide
mission for himself has suddenly become
very honorable he really has been here
is how Kim did it she step one
bombs away Kim may have felt that he had
the leverage to turn and diplomatic
corner once he was able to show that his
country could be a nuclear power step to
turn on the charm
Kim kicks off his charm offensive by
dispatching his so-called army of
beauties to the Winter Olympics in
Pyeongchang he also sends his sister kim
yo-jong the first time a member of the
Kim family visited South Korea since the
Korean War she becomes an overnight
sensation in the south step3
make new friends Kim hosts a delegation
of high-level South Korean officials in
Pyongyang the officials from the South
deliver a bombshell to the White House
Kim wants to meet Trump and Trump
shocking the world says yes Trump
responded saying yes surprise praise
skepticism this was indeed a shocker
step 4
break out of your shell Kim secretly
leaves the country for the first time
since taking power his destination
Beijing where he visits with Chinese
President Xi Jinping it's Kim's first
meeting with another head of state
Step five practice playing nice
Kim hosts the International Olympics
committee in Pyongyang to thank them for
their support and to say that North
Korea will take part in the Tokyo and
Beijing Olympics
step 6 let your hair down
Kim loosens North Korea's iron grip on
pop culture as he and his wife rock out
at a two-hour k-pop concert in Pyongyang
he even poses for a photo with a popular
South Korean girl band red velvet step
seven art of the tease
Kim secretly meets and had a photo op
with then CIA director Mike Pompeo
signaling planning is underway for a
summit step 8
make peace not war North Korea announces
a new pledge to end nuclear and missile
testing enclose a nuclear test sites
step 9
sell the drama kim takes his historic
stroll and calls for an age of peace it
may mark the beginning of a historic
thaw whatever happens it's clearly the
start of a new Kim jong-un
